en: Lanuéjols is a small commune in the south of France, located in the Gard department in the Occitanie region, bordering the Aveyron and Lozère.Lanuéjols is nestled in a sheltered valley, at an altitude of 900 meters, and enjoys a privileged position on the Causse Noir, surrounded by rivers and gorges: the Jonte, the Tarn, the Trévezel and the Dourbie. It is part of the Community of Communes Causses Aigoual Cévennes "Terres Solidaires". The neighbouring towns are Trier, Saint-Sauveur-Camprieu, Meyrueis, Causse-Bégon, Dourbies, etc. The nearest large town to Lanuéjols is Millau, which is about 30 km away. Since 2014, the town of Lanuéjols has decided to embark on a Zero Phyto approach and obtained the "Terre Saine" label in 2017. Thanks to the companies and various services present in the town, it has been able to keep its population young and thus revitalize its territory. Many projects are underway, including the development of a housing estate in 2019.Population: 384 inhabitants at the last censusSurface area: 62.43 km²Altitude: 614 m (min) - 1,187 m (max)The inhabitants of the municipality of Lanuéjols are Lanuéjolais(es)Points of interest: Menhirs and dolmensThe settlement of the Causse Noir and the foundation of Lanuéjols remain a mystery. Between the 7th and 2nd century BC, the indigenous peoples of the Volques arécomiques and the Ruthenians shared the Causse, with the Valat de Garenne as its border, which crosses the communes of Lanuéjols and Revens. Menhirs, dolmens and mortuary caves are the witnesses of this past in our region. The forest of the CommandeursThe forest of the Commandeurs consists of the communal woods of Devois and Rey, those of the Commandeurs belonging to the National Forestry Office, those of Mont Mourié de M. It has always been the main winter reserve for the fragile elafhe deer population of the whole area, and there is no explanation as to why.Walks around Lanuéjols :- The path of the cross of Devois: the forest, crossing a transhumant herd, the clearing of the cross of Devois, the plants...- The path of the cross of the three bishops: the very agricultural hamlet of Mazes, the pastures, a restored dovecote, the flora of the causses...- The fox path: very contrasting landscapes, seeing a fox very early in the morning, troglodytic cheese dairies...- The path of the three farms: Espinassous, Rogers, two castles, a caussenarde farm, vast sheep pastures, clapas, cultivated dolines, flora of the hedgerows...You will also find :1 post office and 1 communal library open from Monday to Friday, from 10.15 am to 12.15 pm from September to June, and from 9.15 am to 12.15 pm in July-August1 24-hour petrol station1 camper van emptying area1 first-aid centre1 communal kitchen providing meals1 crèche, 1 school and 1 training centre for public works professions1 football pitch and 2 children's playgrounds1 grocery store - bakery - pastry shop1 hotel - restaurant1 country café - restaurant1 campsite1 holiday centre10 furnished or self-catering cottagesMany guest roomsFor tourist information the Mont Aigoual Causses Cévennes Tourist Office, Maison de l'Aigoual at the Col de la Serreyrède is at your disposal. Form of contact

hasBeenPublishedBy.schema:logo: https://www.tourismegard.com/Portals/2/Market-place/Le portail des pros du tourisme du Gard_fichiers/logo-Gard-Tourisme.jpg

en:
Lanuéjols is a small town in the south of France, located in the Gard department in the Occitanie region, and bordering the Aveyron and Lozère departments.
Lanuéjols is nestled in a sheltered valley, at an altitude of 900 meters, and enjoys a privileged position on the Causse Noir, surrounded by rivers and gorges: the Jonte, the Tarn, the Trévezel and the Dourbie.

It is part of the Community of Communes Causses Aigoual Cévennes "Terres Solidaires". The neighbouring communes are Trèves, Saint-Sauveur-Camprieu, Meyrueis, Causse-Bégon, Dourbies.
The nearest large town to Lanuéjols is Millau and is about thirty kilometres away.

The commune of Lanuéjols decided, since 2014, to engage in a Zero Phyto approach and obtained the "Terre Saine" label in 2017.
Thanks to the businesses and various services present in the commune, it has been able to keep a young population and thus boost its territory. Many projects are underway, including the development of a housing estate in 2019.

Population : 384 inhabitants at the last census
Surface area: 62.43 km²
Altitude: 614 m (minimum) - 1 187 m (maximum)
The inhabitants of the commune of Lanuéjols are Lanuéjolais(es)

Points of interest :

Menhirs and dolmens
The settlement of the Causse Noir and the foundation of Lanuéjols remain a mystery. Between the 7th and 2nd centuries BC, the Celts settled in the region.
The native peoples of the Volques arécomiques and the Ruthènes shared the Causse, with the Valat de Garenne as their border which crosses the communes of Lanuéjols and Revens.
Menhirs, dolmens, mortuary caves are the witnesses of this past in our region.

The forest of the Commanders
It is made up of the Devois and Rey communal woods, those of the Commandeurs belonging to the Office National des Forêts, those of Mont Mourié belonging to Mr. Fages and those of the Faïsse des Mazes belonging to Mr. Libourel.
It has always been the main winter reserve of the fragile elafhe deer population in this area, and the reason for this is not yet known.

Walks around Lanuéjols :
- The path of the cross of Devois: the forest, cross a transhumant herd, the clearing of the cross of Devois, the plants...
- The path of the cross of the three bishops: the hamlet of Mazes very agricultural, the pastures, a restored dovecote, the flora of the causses...
- The fox trail: very contrasting landscapes, see a fox very early in the morning, troglodytic cheese dairies...
- The path of the three farms: Espinassous, Rogers, two castles, a caussenarde farm, vast sheep pastures, clapas, cultivated dolines, flora of the hedges...

You will also find :
1 postal agency and 1 communal library open from Monday to Friday,
from 10.15am to 12.15pm from September to June, and from 9.15am to 12.15pm in July and August
1 petrol station 24 hours a day and 1 motor home dumping area
1 emergency centre
1 communal kitchen for supplying meals
1 crèche, 1 school and 1 training centre for public works
1 football pitch and 2 children's playgrounds
1 grocery store - bakery - pastry shop
1 hotel - restaurant
1 local café - restaurant
1 campsite
1 holiday centre
10 furnished flats or rural gîtes
Several guest rooms


For tourist information the Tourist Office Mont Aigoual Causses Cévennes, Maison de l'Aigoual at the Col de la Serreyrède is at your disposal.Contact form
fr:
Lanuéjols est une petite commune du sud de la France, située dans le département du Gard en région Occitanie, et limitrophe de l'Aveyron et de la Lozère.
Lanuéjols est nichée dans un vallon abrité, à 900 mètres d'altitude, et bénéficie d'une position privilégiée sur le Causse Noir, entourée de rivières et de gorges: la Jonte, le Tarn, le Trévezel et la Dourbie.

Elle fait partie de la Communauté des Communes Causses Aigoual Cévennes « Terres Solidaires ». Les communes voisines sont Trèves, Saint-Sauveur-Camprieu, Meyrueis, Causse-Bégon, Dourbies.
La grande ville la plus proche de Lanuéjols est Millau et se trouve à environ une trentaine de kilomètres.

La commune de Lanuéjols a décidé, depuis 2014, de s’engager dans une démarche Zéro Phyto et a obtenu le Label « Terre Saine » en 2017.
Grâce aux entreprises et différents services présents sur la commune, elle a su garder une population jeune et ainsi dynamiser son territoire. De nombreux projets sont en cours, dont l’aménagement d’un lotissement courant 2019.

Population : 384 habitants au dernier recensement
Superficie : 62,43 km²
Altitude : 614 m (mini) – 1 187 m (maxi)
Les habitants de la commune de Lanuéjols sont des Lanuéjolais(es)

Points d’intérêts :

Menhirs et dolmens
Le peuplement du Causse Noir et la fondation de Lanuéjols restent un mystère. Entre le VIIe et IIe siècle avant J.C., les Celtes s'installent dans la région.
Les peuples autochtones des Volques arécomiques et des Ruthènes se partagent le Causse, avec pour frontière le Valat de Garenne qui traverse les communes de Lanuéjols et de Revens.
Menhirs, dolmens, grottes mortuaires sont les témoins de ce passé dans notre région.

La forêt des commandeurs
Elle est constituée par les bois communaux du Devois et du Rey, par ceux des Commandeurs appartenant à l'Office national des Forêts, ceux de Mont Mourié de M. Fages et de la Faïsse des Mazes de M. Libourel.
Depuis toujours et sans que l'on puisse à ce jour en expliquer la raison, elle est la principale réserve hivernale de la fragile population de cerf elafhe de toute cette zone.

Balades autour de Lanuéjols :
- Le sentier de la croix du Devois : la forêt, croiser un troupeau transhumant, la clairière de la croix du Devois, les plantes...
- Le sentier de la croix des trois évêques : le hameau des Mazes très agricole, les pâturages, un pigeonnier restauré, la flore des causses...
- Le sentier du renard : paysages très contrastés, apercevoir un renard très tôt le matin, les fromageries troglodytiques...
- Le sentier des trois fermes : Espinassous, Rogers, deux châteaux, une ferme caussenarde, vastes pâtures à moutons, clapas, dolines cultivées, flore des haies...

Vous trouverez aussi :
1 agence postale et 1 bibliothèque communales ouvertes du lundi au vendredi,
de 10h15 à 12h 15 de septembre à juin, et de 9h15 à 12h15 en juillet-août
1 station-service 24h/24het 1 aire de vidange de camping-car
1 centre de secours
1 cuisine communale de fourniture de repas
1 crèche, 1 école et 1 centre de formation  aux métiers des travaux publics
1 terrain de football et 2 aire de jeux pour enfants
1 épicerie - boulangerie - pâtisserie
1 hôtel – restaurant
1 café de pays - restaurant
1 camping
1 centre de vacances
10 meublés ou gîtes ruraux
Plusieurs chambres d'hôtes


Pour des renseignements touristiques l'Office de Tourisme Mont Aigoual Causses Cévennes, Maison de l'Aigoual au Col de la Serreyrède est à votre disposition.Formulaire de contact
